Class AudioSample

Should be used for small audio files such as sound effects.

AudioSample(Byte[], Boolean, Int32)

Creates an audio sample from a byte array.

Declaration
public AudioSample(byte[] data, bool onlycanPlayOnce = false, int concurrentPlaybacks = 10)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Byte[] data

The byte array data of the sample
System.Boolean onlycanPlayOnce

If this sample is set to play only one time. (Default is true)
System.Int32 concurrentPlaybacks

The amount of concurrent playbacks possible for this sample
